comment.brief: Frees up all resources associated with this surface. All paths and prepared objects are invalid after a call to this method. However, whethere they are actually freed now, or when `Unprepare` or `DisposePath` is called is undefined. This means it must always be safe to call those two fucntions, even on an disposed Surface.
comment.full: Frees up all resources associated with this surface. All paths and prepared objects are invalid after a call to this method. However, whethere they are actually freed now, or when `Unprepare` or `DisposePath` is called is undefined. This means it must always be safe to call those two fucntions, even on an disposed Surface.
